title: LOL won't work
body: I continue to receive a message when I try to open league.  PVP.net Patcher Kernal has stopped working. How do I fix this?

replies.body: This error is usually caused by a pc setting that is blocking the patcher from opening.  You should go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings and allow that access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
